text: @PresidencyZA Mr President I support yóú.Ministers i.e. Mhkize,Patel,NDZ and other side of ANC don't have the same agenda as you. It is not about fighting Covid19 ANYMORE<Politics, micromanagement, powerplay> no democracy,no collaborative and sensible strategies. See "laws"in Gazette as proof.
